page.title: 09Bicester Garrison Life (1)
page.content: My dad is in the army.He goes to work in his office at 8am & comes home at 6 pm.He used to go on exercises but now he does not.When he goes on duty he wears green jumper & trousers, black cap & boots.On his right arm he wears a badge,it is a crown & on his wrist he wears a leather bracelet with a crown on to show his rank of W.O.He is on summer camp in Wales now.(LISA GREGORY) My dad is a Superintendant in the M.O.D.(Ministry of Defence) Police.Their main job is security of the Garrison but on 10th June he went to Salisbury Plain to try & move Hippies out of Stonehenge.He comes home from work at 5pm & talks to mum about his work.He wears a hat which is round at the top& has a peak with gold braid on, black jacket, trousers & shoes, & white shirt. (CATHERINE HUTCHINSON).
